Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2016 06:41PM amred wrote: I've always been told that everyone's markers are relative to themselves - so it is the change or progression that is important. I've been over 1000, down to 48, now at 164 several years later I met a lady who had markers in the 10 000 ! Tell your mum to hang in there - the chemo will bring it down, it might take a couple of cycles though.
